conversion_verification.notes: A genuine 3D transformation has occurred, demonstrating all mandatory signs of conversion from the 2D floor plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Minor issues with proportional visibility of interior volume (some small rooms feel less volumetric) and a slight lack of clear separation between floors and walls due to uniform color.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Very good preservation of room configuration, wall geometry, and door/window placements. Minor issues with window proportions and exact placements.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-placed and scaled consistently. Some very minor differences in specific furniture models but overall faithful to the layout intent.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent structural clarity and lighting. The background is clean and aids presentation. Material usage is consistent and there are no rendering artifacts.

summary: This is an excellent and highly faithful 3D conversion, accurately translating the 2D floor plan into a well-rendered isometric 3D model with very few minor discrepancies.
